please_text: Nyamoneka Shyira nomero ya dosiye yawe na numero y'ibanga aho munsi umenye uko dosiye yawe ihagaze.
dear_text: Kuri wowe usaba ubufasga muri USRAP,
first_paragraph: Uru rubuga nurwa RSC Africa byumwihariko kuri dosiye yawe ruzagufasha kumenya amakuru ya dosiye yerekeranye no kwimurirwa mubihugu bya Amerika nk’impunzi. Koresha imbonerahamwe iri ibumoso ufungure winjire maze uronke amakuru agezweho uko dosiye yawe ihagaze.
second_paragraph: Ugombakuba wahawe ijambo ry’ibanga nuwagukoresheje interiviyu yawe ya mbere. Uramutse wibagiwe ijambo ry’ibanga wahawe cyangwa ushaka guhindura iryo jambo ryibanga warusanganwe, nyamuneka kanda kuri “REQUEST PASSWORD CHANGE” ibumoso hanyuma ukurikize amabwirizwa baguhao.
third_paragraph: Niba ufite ibibazo byinyongera, kubyerekeranye na dosiye yawe, RSC Africa cyangwa urwego rwa Amerika rushinzwe kwandika impunzi USRAP, ushobora kutwandikira kuri Case@CWSAfrica.org. RSC Africa izagerageza kugusubiza ibibazo byawe mu minsi 14.
fourth_paragraph: USRAP ni ubuntu. Tanga amakuru yerekeranye no kwakwa inkunga cyangwa ibikekwa kuba ruswa kuri Fraud@CWSAfrica.org.
